Dark Navy Men’s Magnetic Everyday Button-Down – Tailored Fit
Short description: Introducing the revolutionary Everyday Magnetic Button-Down Shirt for Men. Here’s a classic premium shirt, reimagined with effortless dressing features including discreetly hidden magnets. The shirt’s innovative design seamlessly integrates magnets that mimic buttons, offering a sleek appearance while providing the convenience of easy one-handed dressing. The cuffs include extra stretch to allow you to easily slip your hands into the sleeves while the cuffs are buttoned. Perfect for any guy who doesn’t want to fiddle with buttons, whether due to limited dexterity or mobility or age-related changes like arthritis, tremors or limited vision. The Everyday Button Down can bring independence back to dressing while eliminating unnecessary stress, strain and pain.

Product Features

Magnetic front closure for easier independent dressing, even with one hand!
The top button, meant not to not be buttoned for a casual look, is an actual button (not a magnet)
Dropped and enlarged armholes makes reaching behind to fit into the shirt quick & easy
Stretch fabric between shoulders provides more wiggle room for an easy dressing experience
Stretchy fabric on cuffs allows for one-handed dressing
WARNING: This shirt contains magnets that may interfere with pacemakers and defibrillators. Consult your doctor before wearing.

Who It’s For

Independent & Assisted Dressers
Anyone looking for adaptive shirts that are great for lounging at home, working, and going out
Caregivers looking for an easier dressing experience

Adults living with changes related to:

Hand dexterity or mobility
Upper extremity or mobility
Cognition
Arthritis or tremors
Reduced vision 

Care & Fabric

96% Polyester / 4% Spandex 
Machine wash cold & tumble dry on low 
Magnets Present: do not iron or dry clean
